markdownRemark.html: The Data Visualization Society (DVS) was born in Feb 2019. We use Slack as our communicative hub with over 60 channels. This visualization illustrates our activity over the past month and a half, between Feb 2 to Apr 7/2019 – responses vs. emotional reactions of the varied channels.

nextPage.title: The 10 Most Populous U.S. Cities Every Decade Since 1790
